message.template: An unexpected error occurred ({0}).
Input is null.
Input \"{0}\" is not a valid integer.
Open action failed because of unexpected error or invalid file type.
Two or more segments in the same source specification file have the same name: {0}
message.summary: 2 or more segments with same name in SCM
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Two or more fields in the same segment have the same name: {0}.{1}
message.summary: 2 or more fields with same name in same segment in SCM (case-insensitive)
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Segment has no fields defined in source specification: {0}
message.summary: segment with no fields defined in SCM
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Segment name should be composed of letters in CAPs (A-Z), numbers, or the underscore character: \"{0}\"
message.summary: Segment name should be all letters (A-Z) in CAPs, numbers, or the underscore character
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Root segment still has default name: {0}
message.summary: root segment with default root segment name in SCM (different default name than regular segment)
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Segment still has default name: {0}
message.summary: segment with default segment name in SCM
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Field still has default name: {0}.{1}
message.summary: field with default field name in SCM
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Field name should should be composed of letters (A-Z or a-z), numbers, or the underscore character: {0}.{1}
message.summary: Field name should should be all letters (A-Z or a-z), numbers, or the underscore character
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Extraneous segment found in CSV data that is not defined in source specification: {0}
Too many fields in CSV data segment: {0} Found: {1} Expecting: {2}
Could not find parent: \"{1}\" for segment: \"{0}\" at row: {2}
Abstract data type has not been specialized: Element:{0}; Data Type:{1}
message.summary: abstract data type has not been specialized
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: ABSTRACT specialized for: {0}; Data Type:{1}; Speciliazed Type:{2}
message.summary: Data type has been specialized for an Abstract data type
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Choice has not been selected: {0}
message.summary: no choice made on choice box options
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found
message.comment: Don't try to display all the choices, but rather the path to the choice box's parent.

message.template: CHOICE selected: {0}
message.summary: choice made on choice box option
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Have you built out enough occurrences of MULTIPLES to accommodate mappings from source data?
message.summary: reminder to build out multiples where needed
message.happen: After validating, display this message once

message.template: MULTIPLES added for: {0}; Occurence(index): {1} to accommodate mappings from source data
message.summary: reminder adding of multiples where founded
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Have you built out enough CLONE levels to accommodate mappings from source data?
message.summary: reminder to buid out recursive levels where needed
message.happen: After validating, display this message once

message.template: Have you defined DEFAULT VALUES for all elements where needed data is not supplied by the source data file?
message.summary: reminder to define default values where needed
message.happen: After validating, display this message once

message.template: DEFAULT VALUES defined for element \"{0}\" with value \"{1}\"
message.summary: reminder defining default values
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: \"{0}\" is not a valid \"{1}\" type of Object for mapping.
message.summary: not a valid mapping node
message.happen: Continue validating, but display message for each occurrence found
message.comment: Used as one of error message to report invalid mapping.

message.template: \"{0}\" and \"{1}\" is not a valid pair for mapping.
message.summary: not a valid mapping pair
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found
message.comment: Used as one of error message to report invalid mapping pair.

message.template: Source field reference in map is invalid and has been deleted - mapping was to target field: {0}
message.summary: source field referenced in map doesn't exist in source specification
message.happen: Delete mapping, display message and continue validating

message.template: Target field reference in map is invalid and has been deleted - mapping was from source field: {0}.{1}
message.summary: target field referenced in map doesn't exist in target specification
message.happen: Delete mapping, display message and continue validating

message.template: Mandatory target element has no mapping and no default value defined: {0}
message.summary: mandatory HL7 v3 element has neither a mapping in map nor an HL7-defined or user-defined default value in H3S file
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Function input parameter has no mapping: {0}.{1}
message.summary: input parameter for function in map has no mapping and no constant defined
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found

message.template: Function output parameter has no mapping: {0}.{1}
message.summary: output parameter for function in map has no mapping and no constant defined
message.happen: Continue valdiating, but display message for each occurrence found
